Submodules¶

arctern.wrapper_func module¶

arctern.wrapper_func.ST_Point(x, y)[source]¶

Introduction: Construct a Point from X and Y. example:

x = [1,2,3] y = [2,3,4] res = ST_Point(x,y) res = ['POINT (1 2),'POINT (2 3)','POINT (3 4)']
